section.p: This template represents the rationale for an action such as an encounter, a medication administration, or a procedure. The id element can be used to reference a problem recorded elsewhere in the document, or can be used with a code and value to record the problem. Indications for treatment are not laboratory results; rather the problem associated with the laboratory result should be sited (e.g., hypokalemia instead of a laboratory result of Potassium 2.0 mEq/L). Use the Drug Monitoring Act [templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.123] to indicate if a particular drug needs special monitoring (e.g., anticoagulant therapy). Use Precondition for Substance Administration (V2) [templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.25.2] to represent that a medication is to be administered only when the associated criteria are met.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-7482, CONF:1098-10502, CONF:1098-32570 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Indication template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-7483)
Note: If the id element is used to reference a problem recorded else where in the document then this id must equal another entry/id in the same document instance. Application Software must be responsible for resolving the identifier back to its original object and then rendering the information in the correct place in the containing section's narrative text. Its purpose is to obviate the need to repeat the complete XML representation of the referred to entry when relating one entry to another.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which MAY be selected from ValueSet Problem Type (LOINC) 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.2 STATIC 2014-09-02 (CONF:1098-31229)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:1098-7488), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-7489)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL satisfy: The observation/id must equal another entry/id in the same document instance (CONF:1098-7483)
SHALL conform to Indication template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7480, R2.0=CONF:1098-7480)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7481, R2.0=CONF:1098-7481)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-7483)
Note: If the id element is used to reference a problem recorded else where in the document then this id must equal another entry/id in the same document instance. Application Software must be responsible for resolving the identifier back to its original object and then rendering the information in the correct place in the containing section's narrative text. Its purpose is to obviate the need to repeat the complete XML representation of the referred to entry when relating one entry to another.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which MAY be selected from ValueSet Problem Type (LOINC) 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.2 STATIC 2014-09-02 (CONF:1098-31229)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:7487, R2.0=CONF:1098-7487, R2.0=CONF:1098-19105)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7488, R2.0=CONF:1098-7488)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:1098-7488), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-7489)
MAY satisfy: Set the observation/id equal to an ID on the problem list to signify that problem as an indication (CONF:16885)
The value element MAY contain @nullFlavor (CONF:15990)

If the diagnosis is unkown or the SNOMED code is unknown, @nullFlavor SHOULD be "UNK". If the code is something other than SNOMED, @nullFlavor SHOULD be "OTH" and the other code SHOULD be placed in the translation element. (CONF:15991)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL satisfy: The observation/id must equal another entry/id in the same document instance (CONF:1098-7483)

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1728335403"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="241975346"/> </observation>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7482, CONF:10502 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19"
Consol Indication MAY satisfy: Set the observation/id equal to an ID on the problem list to signify that problem as an indication (CONF:16885)
Consol Indication The value element MAY contain @nullFlavor (CONF:15990)

Consol Indication If the diagnosis is unkown or the SNOMED code is unknown, @nullFlavor SHOULD be "UNK". If the code is something other than SNOMED, @nullFlavor SHOULD be "OTH" and the other code SHOULD be placed in the translation element. (CONF:15991)
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Indication SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7480, R2.0=CONF:1098-7480)
Consol Indication SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7481, R2.0=CONF:1098-7481)
Consol Indication SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:7483)
Consol Indication SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem Type 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.2 STATIC 2008-12-18 (CONF:16886)
Consol Indication SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:7487, R2.0=CONF:1098-7487, R2.0=CONF:1098-19105)
Consol Indication SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7488, R2.0=CONF:1098-7488)
Consol Indication SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:7489), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Problem 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.7.4 DYNAMIC (CONF:15985)
